frontend_goals.title: Crew-7 Frontend â€” Core Responsibilities
frontend_goals.copilot_prompt:
Frontend scope for Crew-7.

The frontend must:
1) Provide a clean, fast, dark-themed interface for running crews.
2) Support Chat Mode (default) and Advanced Mode (with Agent Graph).
3) Display live run output (token-level or chunk streams) and agent role indicators.
4) Provide interfaces for Crew settings, Marketplace installation, LLM connections, Env vars, and Traces.
5) Maintain consistency in styling (neon accents, robot avatars, rounded dark UI).
6) Integrate seamlessly with backend WebSockets (/ws/graph, /ws/mission) and SSE.

The frontend must NOT:
- Implement backend logic.
- Hardcode LLM keys.
- Mangle run events or ignore agent status transitions.

Copilot: When editing UI files, ensure designs follow these rules.

frontend_goals.title: Chat Mode & Run Interaction
frontend_goals.copilot_prompt:
Chat/Run UI goals:
1) Chat view is the primary default.
2) It must show streaming tokens/messages.
3) It must show which agent is responding (avatar glow).
4) Control buttons: Restart run, Advanced Mode toggle.
5) It must never block when Advanced Mode is open.

Copilot: Keep the chat responsive, readable, and aligned with run events.

frontend_goals.title: Advanced Mode & Agent Graph
frontend_goals.copilot_prompt:
Advanced Mode graph rules:
1) When enabled, show XYFlow agent graph alongside chat.
2) Nodes must glow when agent is active.
3) Edges must update with latest message.
4) Graph layout must be persisted per crew.
5) Provide Pause/Resume/Cancel controls.

Copilot: Graph should feel alive, responsive, and never break chat layout.

frontend_goals.title: Marketplace UI Rules
frontend_goals.copilot_prompt:
Marketplace UI:
1) Simple grid of crew templates.
2) Each card: name, description, category, Install button.
3) Installing template should redirect to crew details page.
4) No destructive actions.

Copilot: Keep marketplace minimal and visually consistent.

frontend_goals.title: Settings & Mission Lab
frontend_goals.copilot_prompt:
Mission Lab UI goals:
1) Traces page: table view + filters.
2) LLM Connections: provider selector, key inputs, bulk import.
3) Environment Variables: list, add, delete (masked values).
4) All settings pages must follow the dark-neon theme.

Copilot: Keep forms lightweight, consistent, and never block the main workflow.
